meanings.definition: Without a port or connection for external devices.
meanings.sent1: The old laptop was portless, unable to connect to any modern devices.
meanings.sent2: The smartphone was portless, lacking the necessary ports for charging.
meanings.sent3: The robot felt portless, unable to communicate with other machines.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt portless, cut off from the digital world.
meanings.sent5: The portless device seemed outdated in a world of connectivity.

meanings.definition: Not having the ability to transport goods by sea or air.
meanings.sent1: The landlocked country was portless, unable to send goods by sea.
meanings.sent2: The small village was portless, relying on overland routes for trade.
meanings.sent3: The hot air balloon felt portless, unable to carry cargo across oceans.
meanings.sent4: His dreams of flying felt portless, grounded by reality.
meanings.sent5: The portless ship sat idle, unable to sail the open waters.
